de.uni_potsdam.hpi.bpt.bp2014.jconfiguration.rest

Class RestConfiguratorTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.glassfish.jersey.test.JerseyTest
      • de.uni_potsdam.hpi.bpt.bp2014.AbstractTest
        • de.uni_potsdam.hpi.bpt.bp2014.jconfiguration.rest.RestConfiguratorTest

  • public class RestConfiguratorTest
extends AbstractTest
    This class is the test for RestConfigurator. It extends the AbstractTest class, hence the database configuration will be restored afterwards.

      void setUpBase() 
      void testDeleteScenarioInvalid()
      When one sends a DELETE to the returned Status Code should be either 202 or 400 depending of it was possible to delete te scenario or if dependencies failed like all instances are not terminated
      void testDeleteScenarioValid()
      When one sends a DELETE to the returned Status Code should be either 202 or 400 depending of it was possible to delete te scenario or if dependencies failed like all instances are not terminated
      void testGetAllMailTasksIfAbsent()
      When you send a GET to RestConfigurator.getAllEmailTasks(int, String) and the scenario does not contain any mail task an object with no ids will be returned.
      void testGetAllMailTasksJSONResponse()
      When you send a GET to RestConfigurator.getAllEmailTasks(int, String) the returned JSON Object should be a specified.
      void testGetAllMailTasksMissingScenario()
      When you send a Get to RestConfigurator.getAllEmailTasks(int, String) and the ScenarioID is invalid a 404 will be returned but the media type is still JSON.
      void testGetAllWebserviceTasks() 
      void testGetEmailTaskConfigurationMissingMailTask()
      When you send a Get to RestConfigurator.getEmailTaskConfiguration(int, int) with an invalid mailTask an empty JSON object should be returned, with a 404.
      void testGetEmailTaskConfigurationMissingScenario()
      When you send a Get to RestConfigurator.getEmailTaskConfiguration(int, int) with an invalid scenario an empty JSON object should be returned, with a 404.
      void testGetEmailTaskReturnsCorrectJSON()
      When you send a Get to RestConfigurator.getEmailTaskConfiguration(int, int) a valid json object with "receiver", "message", "subject" should be returned
      void testGetEmailTaskReturnsJSON()
      When you send a Get to RestConfigurator.getEmailTaskConfiguration(int, int) a 200 with an json object should be returned
      void testGetMailTasksReturnsJson()
      When you send a GET to RestConfigurator.getAllEmailTasks(int, String) the response should be of type json.

      • testGetMailTasksReturnsJson

        public void testGetMailTasksReturnsJson()
        When you send a GET to RestConfigurator.getAllEmailTasks(int, String) the response should be of type json.

      • testGetAllMailTasksIfAbsent

        public void testGetAllMailTasksIfAbsent()
        When you send a GET to RestConfigurator.getAllEmailTasks(int, String) and the scenario does not contain any mail task an object with no ids will be returned.

      • testGetAllMailTasksJSONResponse

        public void testGetAllMailTasksJSONResponse()
        When you send a GET to RestConfigurator.getAllEmailTasks(int, String) the returned JSON Object should be a specified. {"ids":[1,2,...],"labels":{1:"abcd"...}}}

      • testGetAllMailTasksMissingScenario

        public void testGetAllMailTasksMissingScenario()
        When you send a Get to RestConfigurator.getAllEmailTasks(int, String) and the ScenarioID is invalid a 404 will be returned but the media type is still JSON.

      • testGetEmailTaskConfigurationMissingScenario

        public void testGetEmailTaskConfigurationMissingScenario()
        When you send a Get to RestConfigurator.getEmailTaskConfiguration(int, int) with an invalid scenario an empty JSON object should be returned, with a 404.

      • testGetEmailTaskConfigurationMissingMailTask

        public void testGetEmailTaskConfigurationMissingMailTask()
        When you send a Get to RestConfigurator.getEmailTaskConfiguration(int, int) with an invalid mailTask an empty JSON object should be returned, with a 404.

      • testGetEmailTaskReturnsJSON

        public void testGetEmailTaskReturnsJSON()
        When you send a Get to RestConfigurator.getEmailTaskConfiguration(int, int) a 200 with an json object should be returned

      • testGetEmailTaskReturnsCorrectJSON

        public void testGetEmailTaskReturnsCorrectJSON()
        When you send a Get to RestConfigurator.getEmailTaskConfiguration(int, int) a valid json object with "receiver", "message", "subject" should be returned
